title: ФЕЙК
overview: This is a story about a simple student named Lech. He falls in love with the daughter of the most influential businessman in the city and, having disrupted her birthday, gets a round sum. To try to get the money back, Lech gathers a team of friends and decides to sell fake clothes. Whether it will be possible to repay the debt or the thirst for profit will put the lives of people close to Lech on the line, we will find out very soon.
